title: Pfizer
description: Pfizer, a leading company in the pharmaceutical and biotechnology industry, uses a vibrant palette of colors to represent its brand identity. The primary color is a vibrant blue (0093D0), complemented by a series of other colors such as black (000000), greys (616365), and a spectrum of brighter tones including teal (00AEEF), magenta (D6006E), and lime green (7DBA00). These colors are recognized from Pfizer's brand identity elements accessible through their official identity webpage.
